titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: SOURCE OF ADMISSION CODE (HOSPITAL PROVIDER SPELL) - Description

div.p: SOURCE OF ADMISSION CODE (HOSPITAL PROVIDER SPELL) is the same as attribute SOURCE OF ADMISSION.
SOURCE OF ADMISSION CODE (HOSPITAL PROVIDER SPELL) is the source of admission to a Hospital Provider Spell in a Hospital Site.

SOURCE OF ADMISSION CODE (HOSPITAL PROVIDER SPELL) is used by the Secondary Uses Service to derive the
Healthcare Resource Group
4. Failure to correctly populate this data element is likely to result in an incorrect Healthcare Resource Group, usually associated with lower levels of Healthcare resource.
For further information, please refer to the NHS Digital website at: Payment by Results Guidance.
For specific National Code usage in different data sets, see SOURCE OF ADMISSION.
